title: Harvard Catalyst Profiles
cleaned_text: the National Library of Medicine's controlled vocabulary thesaurus, MeSH (Medical Subject Headings). Descriptors are arranged in a hierarchical structure, which enables searching at various levels of specificity. Below are MeSH descriptors whose meaning is more general than "Anthroposophy".
